name: dotFiles
description: Dotfiles and a small installer for classroom VMs. Provides safe, minimal defaults and an optional package installer for students.
goals: Provide safe, minimal shell and editor defaults for student VMs
Offer a conservative installer to copy or symlink dotfiles
Provide a small app-installer script listing recommended packages
Make the repo easy to fork and customize per student
Keep defaults transparent (do not install a global gitignore by default)

vibe_coding.notes: Machine-readable goals to help classroom automation and discovery
